title: Government Polytechnic College, Itarsi
content: Government Polytechnic College, Itarsi (GPC Itarsi) is a premier technical institution located in Itarsi, Madhya Pradesh. Established in 1960, the college has been at the forefront of technical education in the region for over six decades. The college is affiliated with Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya (RGPV) and is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE).
mission: To provide quality technical education that prepares students for leadership and service in a diverse and global society. We aim to nurture technically skilled professionals who can contribute meaningfully to the nation's development.
vision: To be recognized as a premier institution of technical education, known for its academic excellence, innovative teaching methods, and commitment to producing industry-ready professionals.
principalMessage: Welcome to Government Polytechnic College, Itarsi. For over six decades, our institution has been committed to providing quality technical education to students from all walks of life. Our mission is to nurture technically skilled professionals who can contribute meaningfully to the nation's development. We believe in holistic education that combines theoretical knowledge with practical skills, ethical values, and social responsibility. Our dedicated faculty members, state-of-the-art infrastructure, and industry connections ensure that our students receive the best possible education and career opportunities. I invite you to explore our website and learn more about our programs, facilities, and achievements. Join us in our journey of excellence and innovation in technical education.
